article: Please look at the photo. It is the photo  _  my family. This is my grandfather.  _  name is Dave Hand. He is a doctor. And this is my grandmother. Her name  _  Anna Brown. She is my father's  _  . The tall man is my father. He likes playing baseball. He  _  cool. The nice woman is my mother. She likes watching TV. She has  _  yellow ring. The man with glasses is my  _  . He is my father's brother. His  _  is Paul. He comes to see my grandparents with Emma and their daughter Mona. Look! The young woman is my aunt. Her  _  name is Smith. And the little girl is my  _  . Her name is Mona Hand. The boy in the photo is Tim. It's me.
